comments.body: Now the tests fail by NPE.
YARN-6916 broke this. I'll attach a patch shortly.

Before YARN-6916, getUser method was not called because there was a guard to skip the method. The patch added back the guard and overrided getUser method to run the test successfully even if the log level is debug.
